description: The rules system allows you to add your servers rules into Wynem. This allows members to quickly and easily quickly quotes messages to people, rather than having to redirect them to the rules channel to read them there.
You can even create a stylised rule showcase message for your rules channel!

data.title: Welcome to Ewan's Server!
data.description:
Please follow these simple rules:
## 1: Follow the Discord Terms of Service
Please follow the Discord Terms of Service in all regards within this server.
## 2: Be respectful and mature
Keep a respectful tone and be mature throughout conversation. If you have an issue with a member please take it to DMs.
## 3: No discrimination
No toxicity, racism, bullying, transphobia, homophobia, etc., will be tolerated in this server.## 4: Use appropriate channels for messages
Please keep messages in their appropriate channels. For example commands go in <#commands> and memes go in <#memes>.
## 5: English only
Please only speak English in this discord server. It is the only language the moderators know, so therefore the only one we can moderate.
## 6: No alternate accounts
Alternate accounts are not allowed on this server.

tabs.name: Quoting rules
content: To quote all the server rules, you can use the <command:rule|server rules> command.

tabs.name: Embedding rules
content: You are able to create a custom embed that showcases the server rules. For an example of this, refer to the top of this page.
To do this, use the <command:embedrules|serverconfig rule embed> command.
This command will launch the embed builder. For more information on that, see the [Custom Embeds](/features/custom-embeds) feature.
